Najväčšími klamármi medzi politikmi sú podľa ľudí Harabin, Fico a Sulík
03 Nov 2019, 15:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Prezidentka SR Zuzana Čaputová najviac hovorí pravdu, vyplýva z prieskumu agentúry Focus, ktorý zverejnila Televízia Markíza. Respondenti dostali v prieskum otázku, kto z politikov najviac hovorí pravdu. Najviac Slovákov (41,8 percenta) označilo prezidentku Čaputovú, za ňou nasledovali premiér Peter Pellegrini (32,2 percenta) a bývalý prezident a súčasný predseda strany Za ľudí Andrej Kiska (21,2 percenta).
Naopak, najčastejšie podľa respondentov klame Štefan Harabin (53,8 percenta), Robert Fico (53,5 percenta) a Richard Sulík (49,1 percenta). Prieskum realizovali od 15. do 22. októbra na vzorke 1 021 respondentov.

According to people, the biggest liars among politicians are Harabin, Fico and Sulik
03 Nov 2019, 15:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - President of the Slovak Republic Zuzana Caputova tells the truth the most, results from a survey of the agency Focus, published by Television Markiza. In the survey, respondents were asked which of the politicians is most telling the truth. Most of the Slovaks (41.8 percent) were named by Čaputová, followed by Prime Minister Peter Pellegrini (32.2 percent) and former President and current chairman of the People's Party Andrej Kiska (21.2 percent).
On the other hand, the most frequently declined by respondents is Stefan Harabin (53.8 percent), Robert Fico (53.5 percent) and Richard Sulik (49.1 percent). The survey was conducted from 15 to 22 October on a sample of 1,021 respondents.
